alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cheboygan and southwestern Presque Isle Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1237 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tower, or near Onaway, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tower around 1240 PM EDT. Allis Township around 1250 PM EDT. Onaway and Onaway State Park around 1255 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Millersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
